category: Member city/provincial sports association regulations/Article 34 (approval of executives of city/provincial sports organizations, etc.)
contents: Article 34 (Approval of executives of city/provincial sports organizations, etc.) ① The president of a city/provincial sports organization shall take office after receiving approval from the city/provincial sports council, attaching a letter of consent to approval from the member sports organizations of the sports association. Revised 2020. 7. 29., 2021. 10. 6. ② If there is a defect in the approval due to disqualification of an executive or other reasons after approval by the city/provincial sports council, the approval may be canceled or withdrawn ex officio. Revised May 10, 2022. ③ When calculating the number of consecutive terms limited for executives of city/provincial sports organizations, the experience of executives of city/provincial sports organizations, other city/provincial sports organizations, and national federations is also included. Newly established 2016. 6. 16., 2017. 3. 23.
